messages.title: Putting Islington & Finsbury first
messages.content:
Local champion Bridget Fox has lived in Islington for nearly 20 years - her radar ran a shop on City Road.
Bridget works tirelessly for local people and already has been a local councillor for 10 years.
It was Bridget who led the campaign that saved the Essex Road Post Office when Labour tried to close it.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bridget is now leading campaigns to save Whittington A&E, to put more police on our streets and to get better bus/conner referral times for Islington women.

issues.health: Lead campaigns to save Whittington A&E

politicalExperience.achievements: Led the campaign that saved the Essex Road Post Office

leaflet.additionalNotes: Bridget Fox - the local, positive choice
